name: Sesame Crunch Edamame

ingredients.name: frozen edamame or steamed green beans
Poke Bowl Topper Blend or Everything Bagel Whole Food Topper

preparation: In Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup, boil frozen edamame until heated through, 3–5 minutes. Be careful not to overcook or they’ll turn mushy.
Drain well, then place in a bowl. Toss with Poke Bowl Topper if desired. Serve warm.
tips: Look for packages of edamame in the freezer section of your grocery store. They’re sold in pods as well as shelled. Either works well. Can’t find any? Swap out for steamed green beans instead.

products.name: Poke Bowl Topper Blend
summary: Umami, nutty and crunchy topper for any noodle dishes, rice, or salads.

products.name: Everything Bagel Whole Food Topper
summary: Reminiscent of a big bite of a seasoned toasted bagel.
